roman_nepali: Yo din ta dherai busy bhayo yaar. Morning dekhi nai meeting after meeting, kei kam sakina. Lunch pani 2 bajey khako, aba evening ma chai ali relax garna paryo. Tara ghar ma pani kei kam xaina, fridge khali xa. Aajai market janu parla jasto xa. K garne, life nai testai ho.
english: This day was so busy, man. From the morning, it was meeting after meeting, couldn’t get any work done. I even had lunch at 2 PM, now I need to relax a bit in the evening. But there’s nothing at home either, the fridge is empty. Looks like I’ll have to go to the market again. What to do, that’s just how life is.

roman_nepali: Last month ma Pokhara gako thiye, dherai maja ayo. Few days matra gayeko thiye tara dherai explore garna sakyau. Phewa Lake ma boat ride liye, sarai peaceful thyo. Ani sarangi ko music sunda sunda hike gareko thulo thulo pahad haru ma. Ahh, I wish feri janu paryo. Nepal ko nature nai arko level ko xa.
english: Last month, I went to Pokhara, and it was so much fun. I was only there for a few days, but I got to explore a lot. I took a boat ride on Phewa Lake; it was so peaceful. And while listening to Sarangi music, I hiked in the big mountains. Ahh, I wish I could go again. Nepal’s nature is just on another level.

roman_nepali: Aajai momo khana man lagyo, tara ghar ma banuna ali garo xa. Malai ta jhole momo dherai man parxa, spicy ra juicy vayeko. Tyo sath ma achar pani thulo kura ho. Khas ma Nepali khana ko taste nai arko xa, fast food vanda dherai better. Aajai ta restaurant ma jane sochiraxu, k khaam hola?
english: Today I felt like eating momo, but it’s a bit hard to make at home. I really love jhol momo, the spicy and juicy ones. The chutney is also a big deal. Honestly, Nepali food tastes so much better, way better than fast food. I’m thinking of going to a restaurant today, what should I eat?

roman_nepali: Yo new phone ma dherai features xa, tara ali complicated pani xa. Maile ta aajai samma pani tyo AI camera ko setting bujhina. Ani tyo gesture control ta ekdamai confusing xa. Tara camera quality chai ekdamai ramro xa, photos haru ekdamai sharp aauna thaleko xa. Aba ali time lagla sikauna lai.
english: This new phone has a lot of features, but it’s also a bit complicated. I still haven’t figured out the AI camera settings. And that gesture control is so confusing. But the camera quality is really good; the photos are coming out super sharp. It’ll take some time to learn everything.

roman_nepali: Aajai ali down feel vairako xu, kina thaxaina. Maybe tyo office ko stress le garda hola. Tara malai afno emotions handle garna ali garo vairako xa. Kura kasaiko sath ma share garna ni sakina, kei kura haru afai ma simayera basnu parxa. Life ma kati kati ups and downs aauxa ni.
english: Today I’m feeling a bit down, I don’t know why. Maybe it’s because of office stress. But I’m finding it hard to handle my emotions. I can’t even share things with anyone; some things just have to be kept to myself. Life has so many ups and downs.

roman_nepali: Malai ta photography ekdamai man parxa, especially nature photography. Last weekend ma Swayambhu gako thiye, ani dherai ramro photos khicheko thiye. Tyo golden hour ma ta photos haru magic jasto dekhinxa. Aba ta ma photo editing pani sikiraxu, Lightroom use garera. Kei creative garna paryo ni life ma.
english: I really love photography, especially nature photography. Last weekend, I went to Swayambhu and took a lot of great photos. During the golden hour, the photos look magical. Now I’m even learning photo editing using Lightroom. You have to do something creative in life.

roman_nepali: Aajai mero didi le phone garyo, dherai din vayo kura nagareko. Usle chai Australia ma naya job paako raixa, malai ta dherai khusi lagyo. Family ko sabai lai news sunauda ali emotional pani vayo. Hamro family ma sabai ek arka lai support garxan, yo nai ho hamro strength.
english: Today my sister called me; it had been a long time since we talked. She got a new job in Australia, and I felt so happy. When she shared the news with the whole family, it got a bit emotional too. In our family, everyone supports each other; that’s our strength.

roman_nepali: Aajai doctor le bhanyo malai regular exercise garnu parxa re. Maile ta dherai din dekhi gym jana chodeko thiye, tara aba feri start garnu parla jasto xa. Health nai sabai ho, ani malai pani ali weight loss garnu xa. Daily routine ma change lyauna parla.
english: Today the doctor told me I need to exercise regularly. I had stopped going to the gym for a long time, but now I think I need to start again. Health is everything, and I also need to lose some weight. I’ll have to make changes to my daily routine.

roman_nepali: Dashain aaudai xa, malai ta dherai excitement vairako xa. Ghar ma sabai family jamma hunxan, ani dherai mitho mitho khana haru banxa. Tika lagauna, swing jhulna, ani aama ko masu bhat khana, yo sabai nai Dashain ko special kura ho. Ahh, I can’t wait!
english: Dashain is coming, and I’m so excited. The whole family gathers at home, and lots of delicious food is made. Putting on tika, swinging on the swing, and eating my mom’s meat and rice—these are all special things about Dashain. Ahh, I can’t wait!

roman_nepali: Mero exam ko result aayo, ani ma dherai happy xu. Maile dherai mehenat gareko thiye, ani aaja tyo result dekhda ali proud feel vairako xa. Tara aba feri arko semester suru hunxa, so ali rest liyera feri padhna suru garnu parla. Education nai ho future ko key.
english: My exam result came out, and I’m so happy. I worked really hard, and today, seeing that result, I feel proud. But now another semester is starting, so after some rest, I’ll have to start studying again. Education is the key to the future.

roman_nepali: Mero best friend le surprise visit garyo aajai, malai ta dherai khusi lagyo. Hamile dherai din dekhi kura nagareko thiye, tara aajai sabai kura haru share gareu. True friendship ma time ko kei farak pardaina, hamro bond testai strong xa.
english: My best friend surprised me with a visit today, and I was so happy. We hadn’t talked in a long time, but today we shared everything. In true friendship, time doesn’t matter; our bond is just that strong.

roman_nepali: Aajai mall ma gayera dherai kineko xu, malai ta shopping garne ekdamai man parxa. New clothes, shoes, ani ali makeup items pani kineko xu. Tara aba bank account ali khali xa, so next month samma control ma basnu parla.
english: Today I went to the mall and bought a lot of things; I really love shopping. I bought new clothes, shoes, and some makeup items too. But now my bank account is a bit empty, so I’ll have to control myself until next month.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile tyo new Nepali movie herera aaye, dherai ramro lagyo. Story, acting, ani music sabai ekdamai thulo level ko thyo. Nepali film industry le dherai progress gareko xa, malai ta dherai proud lagxa. Ahh, I’m so impressed!
english: Today I watched that new Nepali movie, and I really liked it. The story, acting, and music were all top-notch. The Nepali film industry has made so much progress; I feel so proud. Ahh, I’m so impressed!

roman_nepali: Yo winter ko season ma ta ekdamai cold vairako xa, morning ma ta bed bata nai uthna man lagdaina. Tara malai chai winter dherai man parxa, especially tyo chiya ko sath biscuit khana. Ahh, winter ko maja nai arko xa.
english: This winter season is so cold; in the morning, I don’t even feel like getting out of bed. But I really love winter, especially eating biscuits with tea. Ahh, winter has its own charm.

roman_nepali: Aajai football khelna gayeko thiye, dherai maja ayo. Hamro team le 3-1 le jityo, ani malai pani 2 goals garna sakyau. Sports le ta mind fresh garxa, ani body pani healthy rakhxa. Aba regular khelna jane sochiraxu.
english: Today I went to play football, and it was so much fun. Our team won 3-1, and I managed to score 2 goals. Sports really freshen up the mind and keep the body healthy. Now I’m thinking of playing regularly.

roman_nepali: Malai ta Nepali music dherai man parxa, especially tyo old classical songs haru. Aajai maile Ani Choying Dolma ko song suneko thiye, ekdamai soothing thyo. Music le ta life ma energy nai dinxa, malai ta daily music sunnu parchha.
english: I really love Nepali music, especially those old classical songs. Today I listened to Ani Choying Dolma’s song, and it was so soothing. Music gives energy to life; I need to listen to music every day.

roman_nepali: Aajai office ma dherai workload thiyo, aba ghar ma pani kei kam xa. Tara malai ta ali rest garnu parne thiyo, so I decided to take a break. Life ma balance rakhna nai parchha ni.
english: Today there was a lot of workload at the office, and I have some work at home too. But I really needed some rest, so I decided to take a break. You have to maintain balance in life.

roman_nepali: Malai ta hiking garna dherai man parxa, especially tyo green forest haru ma. Last week ma Shivapuri gako thiye, dherai ramro lagyo. Nature le ta mind lai fresh nai garidinxa.
english: I really love hiking, especially in those green forests. Last week, I went to Shivapuri, and it was amazing. Nature really freshens up the mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile new recipe try gareko thiye, Italian pasta banako. Malai ta dherai mitho lagyo, tara mero sathi le chai ali salty bhanyo. Next time ma ali careful hune bichar xu.
english: Today I tried a new recipe; I made Italian pasta. I really liked it, but my friend said it was a bit salty. Next time, I’ll be more careful.

roman_nepali: Yo summer ma ta dherai garmi vairako xa, fan pani kei kaam gardaina. Malai ta cold drinks ra ice cream khana man lagxa, tara health ko lagi ramro haina. K garne, season nai testai ho.
english: This summer is so hot; even the fan doesn’t help much. I feel like having cold drinks and ice cream, but it’s not good for health. What to do, that’s just how the season is.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old photo haru herthe, dherai memories refresh bhayo. School ko din haru kati ramro thiyo, sabai sathi haru sanga khelera time pass garinthyo. Ahh, I miss those days.
english: Today I was looking at my old photos, and so many memories came back. School days were so good; we used to spend time playing with friends. Ahh, I miss those days.

roman_nepali: Malai ta reading books dherai man parxa, especially tyo mystery novels haru. Aajai maile new book kineko xu, weekend ma padexu bhanera sochiraxu. Books le ta mind lai expand nai garxa.
english: I really love reading books, especially mystery novels. Today I bought a new book, and I’m thinking of reading it over the weekend. Books really expand the mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero room lai clean gareko xu, dherai din dekhi messy thiyo. Aba ta sabai kura haru organize bhayo, ali fresh feel vairako xa. Clean environment le ta mood nai ramro banauxa.
english: Today I cleaned my room; it had been messy for a long time. Now everything is organized, and it feels fresh. A clean environment really improves your mood.

roman_nepali: Malai ta bike riding dherai man parxa, especially tyo highway ma. Aajai maile Narayanghat samma ride gareko thiye, dherai maja ayo. Wind le ta mind lai refresh nai garidinxa.
english: I really love bike riding, especially on the highway. Today I rode to Narayanghat, and it was so much fun. The wind really refreshes your mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero laptop ko screen bigaryo, dherai tension bhayo. Aba ta repair garna parla, tara paisa pani kharcha hune bhayo. Technology ta helpful xa, tara kehi chada problems pani dinxa.
english: Today I broke my laptop screen, and I’m so stressed. Now I’ll have to get it repaired, and it’s going to cost money. Technology is helpful, but it also brings some problems.

roman_nepali: Malai ta coffee dherai man parxa, especially morning ma. Aajai maile new coffee beans kineko xu, aba daily fresh coffee banaune sochiraxu. Coffee le ta day nai bright banauxa.
english: I really love coffee, especially in the morning. Today I bought new coffee beans, and I’m thinking of making fresh coffee daily. Coffee really brightens up the day.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero guitar ma new song practice gareko xu, dherai din dekhi practice nagareko thiye. Tara aba feri regular practice garna thaleko xu, music le ta soul lai touch garxa.
english: Today I practiced a new song on my guitar; I hadn’t practiced in a long time. But now I’ve started practicing regularly again. Music really touches the soul.

roman_nepali: Malai ta rain dherai man parxa, especially tyo monsoon ko season ma. Aajai pani pareko thiyo, maile ta balcony ma basera enjoy gareko thiye. Rain le ta nature lai fresh nai garidinxa.
english: I really love rain, especially during the monsoon season. Today it rained, and I enjoyed sitting on the balcony. Rain really freshens up nature.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old diary herthe, dherai memories haru thiyo tyo ma. School ko din haru, crush ko kura haru, sabai le ekdamai emotional banayo. Ahh, life ko journey nai testai ho.
english: Today I was looking at my old diary, and there were so many memories in it. School days, crushes, everything made me emotional. Ahh, that’s just how life’s journey is.

roman_nepali: Malai ta photography dherai man parxa, especially tyo sunset ko time ma. Aajai maile Phewa Lake ma sunset ko photo khicheko thiye, ekdamai beautiful thyo. Photography le ta moments lai capture garxa.
english: I really love photography, especially during sunset. Today I took photos of the sunset at Phewa Lake; it was so beautiful. Photography captures moments.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero pet dog lai park ma lagayera walk gareko thiye, usle ta dherai maja payo. Dogs haru ta ekdamai loyal hunxan, malai ta uniharu sanga bond nai arko xa.
english: Today I took my pet dog for a walk in the park, and he loved it. Dogs are so loyal; I have a special bond with them.

roman_nepali: Malai ta cooking dherai man parxa, especially new recipes try garna. Aajai maile Thai curry banako xu, dherai mitho bhayo. Cooking le ta creativity lai express garna help garxa.
english: I really love cooking, especially trying new recipes. Today I made Thai curry, and it turned out delicious. Cooking helps express creativity.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero favorite series ko new season herthe, dherai exciting thyo. Maile ta ekai din ma sabai episodes sakaye, aba arko season ko wait garna parla. Series le ta time pass nai ramro hunxa.
english: Today I watched the new season of my favorite series, and it was so exciting. I finished all the episodes in one day; now I’ll have to wait for the next season. Series are a great way to pass time.

roman_nepali: Malai ta gardening dherai man parxa, especially flowers haru lagauna. Aajai maile mero garden ma new roses lagako xu, aba ali care garna parla. Gardening le ta mind lai calm garxa.
english: I really love gardening, especially planting flowers. Today I planted new roses in my garden; now I’ll have to take care of them. Gardening really calms the mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old friend lai bhetna gayeko thiye, dherai din dekhi bheteko thiyeina. Hamile dherai kura haru share gareu, ani tyo old memories haru refresh bhayo. Friendship ta ekdamai valuable xa.
english: Today I went to meet my old friend; we hadn’t met in a long time. We shared so many things, and those old memories came back. Friendship is so valuable.

roman_nepali: Malai ta stargazing dherai man parxa, especially tyo clear night ma. Aajai maile rooftop ma basera stars herthe, ekdamai peaceful thyo. Universe ko beauty nai arko level ko xa.
english: I really love stargazing, especially on clear nights. Today I sat on the rooftop and watched the stars; it was so peaceful. The beauty of the universe is on another level.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero ghar ko garden ma new flowers lagako xu, dherai ramro dekhinxa. Gardening le ta mind lai fresh nai garidinxa, ani malai pani ali time pass hunxa.
english: Today I planted new flowers in my home garden; they look so beautiful. Gardening really freshens up the mind, and it’s also a good way to pass time.

roman_nepali: Malai ta cycling dherai man parxa, especially tyo early morning ma. Aajai maile 10 km cycle gareko thiye, dherai refreshing feel bhayo. Exercise le ta body lai active rakhxa.
english: I really love cycling, especially in the early morning. Today I cycled 10 km, and it felt so refreshing. Exercise keeps the body active.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old photo album herthe, dherai memories haru thiyo. School ko picnic, birthday parties, sabai le ekdamai emotional banayo. Ahh, I miss those days.
english: Today I was looking at my old photo album, and there were so many memories. School picnics, birthday parties—everything made me emotional. Ahh, I miss those days.

roman_nepali: Malai ta painting dherai man parxa, especially tyo landscape haru. Aajai maile new painting suru gareko xu, aba ali time lagla sakuna lai. Art le ta creativity lai express garna help garxa.
english: I really love painting, especially landscapes. Today I started a new painting; it’ll take some time to finish. Art helps express creativity.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero pet cat lai new toy kineko xu, usle ta dherai maja payo. Cats haru ta ekdamai cute hunxan, malai ta uniharu sanga bond nai arko xa.
english: Today I bought a new toy for my pet cat, and she loved it. Cats are so cute; I have a special bond with them.

roman_nepali: Malai ta hiking dherai man parxa, especially tyo hills haru ma. Aajai maile Nagarkot hike gareko thiye, dherai ramro view thyo. Nature le ta mind lai refresh nai garidinxa.
english: I really love hiking, especially in the hills. Today I hiked to Nagarkot, and the view was amazing. Nature really refreshes the mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero favorite book ko sequel kineko xu, aba padhna suru gareko xu. Books le ta mind lai expand nai garxa, ani malai pani ali knowledge badhxa.
english: Today I bought the sequel to my favorite book, and I’ve started reading it. Books really expand the mind, and they also increase knowledge.

roman_nepali: Malai ta cooking dherai man parxa, especially tyo new recipes try garna. Aajai maile Italian pasta banako xu, dherai mitho bhayo. Cooking le ta creativity lai express garna help garxa.
english: I really love cooking, especially trying new recipes. Today I made Italian pasta, and it turned out delicious. Cooking helps express creativity.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero room ko decoration change gareko xu, dherai ramro dekhinxa. New curtains ra wall art haru le ta room lai ali lively banayo. Change is good sometimes.
english: Today I changed the decoration of my room, and it looks so nice. New curtains and wall art made the room more lively. Change is good sometimes.

roman_nepali: Malai ta photography dherai man parxa, especially tyo sunrise ko time ma. Aajai maile Pokhara ma sunrise ko photo khicheko thiye, ekdamai beautiful thyo. Photography le ta moments lai capture garxa.
english: I really love photography, especially during sunrise. Today I took photos of the sunrise in Pokhara; it was so beautiful. Photography captures moments.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old friend lai bhetna gayeko thiye, dherai din dekhi bheteko thiyeina. Hamile dherai kura haru share gareu, ani tyo old memories haru refresh bhayo. Friendship ta ekdamai valuable xa.

english: Today I broke my laptop screen, and I’m so stressed. Now I’ll have to get it repaired, and it’s going to cost money. Technology is helpful, but it also brings some problems.

roman_nepali: Malai ta cooking dherai man parxa, especially tyo new recipes try garna. Aajai maile Italian pasta banako xu, dherai mitho bhayo. Cooking le ta creativity lai express garna help garxa.
english: I really love cooking, especially trying new recipes. Today I made Italian pasta, and it turned out delicious. Cooking helps express creativity.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero room ko decoration change gareko xu, dherai ramro dekhinxa. New curtains ra wall art haru le ta room lai ali lively banayo. Change is good sometimes.
english: Today I changed the decoration of my room, and it looks so nice. New curtains and wall art made the room more lively. Change is good sometimes.

roman_nepali: Malai ta photography dherai man parxa, especially tyo sunrise ko time ma. Aajai maile Pokhara ma sunrise ko photo khicheko thiye, ekdamai beautiful thyo. Photography le ta moments lai capture garxa.
english: I really love photography, especially during sunrise. Today I took photos of the sunrise in Pokhara; it was so beautiful. Photography captures moments.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old friend lai bhetna gayeko thiye, dherai din dekhi bheteko thiyeina. Hamile dherai kura haru share gareu, ani tyo old memories haru refresh bhayo. Friendship ta ekdamai valuable xa.
english: Today I went to meet my old friend; we hadn’t met in a long time. We shared so many things, and those old memories came back. Friendship is so valuable.

roman_nepali: Malai ta stargazing dherai man parxa, especially tyo clear night ma. Aajai maile rooftop ma basera stars herthe, ekdamai peaceful thyo. Universe ko beauty nai arko level ko xa.
english: I really love stargazing, especially on clear nights. Today I sat on the rooftop and watched the stars; it was so peaceful. The beauty of the universe is on another level.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero laptop ko screen bigaryo, dherai tension bhayo. Aba ta repair garna parla, tara paisa pani kharcha hune bhayo. Technology ta helpful xa, tara kehi chada problems pani dinxa.
english: Today I broke my laptop screen, and I’m so stressed. Now I’ll have to get it repaired, and it’s going to cost money. Technology is helpful, but it also brings some problems.

roman_nepali: Malai ta coffee dherai man parxa, especially morning ma. Aajai maile new coffee beans kineko xu, aba daily fresh coffee banaune sochiraxu. Coffee le ta day nai bright banauxa.
english: I really love coffee, especially in the morning. Today I bought new coffee beans, and I’m thinking of making fresh coffee daily. Coffee really brightens up the day.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero guitar ma new song practice gareko xu, dherai din dekhi practice nagareko thiye. Tara aba feri regular practice garna thaleko xu, music le ta soul lai touch garxa.
english: Today I practiced a new song on my guitar; I hadn’t practiced in a long time. But now I’ve started practicing regularly again. Music really touches the soul.

roman_nepali: Malai ta rain dherai man parxa, especially tyo monsoon ko season ma. Aajai pani pareko thiyo, maile ta balcony ma basera enjoy gareko thiye. Rain le ta nature lai fresh nai garidinxa.
english: I really love rain, especially during the monsoon season. Today it rained, and I enjoyed sitting on the balcony. Rain really freshens up nature.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old diary herthe, dherai memories haru thiyo tyo ma. School ko din haru, crush ko kura haru, sabai le ekdamai emotional banayo. Ahh, life ko journey nai testai ho.
english: Today I was looking at my old diary, and there were so many memories in it. School days, crushes, everything made me emotional. Ahh, that’s just how life’s journey is.

roman_nepali: Malai ta photography dherai man parxa, especially tyo sunset ko time ma. Aajai maile Phewa Lake ma sunset ko photo khicheko thiye, ekdamai beautiful thyo. Photography le ta moments lai capture garxa.
english: I really love photography, especially during sunset. Today I took photos of the sunset at Phewa Lake; it was so beautiful. Photography captures moments.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero pet dog lai park ma lagayera walk gareko thiye, usle ta dherai maja payo. Dogs haru ta ekdamai loyal hunxan, malai ta uniharu sanga bond nai arko xa.
english: Today I took my pet dog for a walk in the park, and he loved it. Dogs are so loyal; I have a special bond with them.

roman_nepali: Malai ta cooking dherai man parxa, especially new recipes try garna. Aajai maile Thai curry banako xu, dherai mitho bhayo. Cooking le ta creativity lai express garna help garxa.
english: I really love cooking, especially trying new recipes. Today I made Thai curry, and it turned out delicious. Cooking helps express creativity.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero favorite series ko new season herthe, dherai exciting thyo. Maile ta ekai din ma sabai episodes sakaye, aba arko season ko wait garna parla. Series le ta time pass nai ramro hunxa.
english: Today I watched the new season of my favorite series, and it was so exciting. I finished all the episodes in one day; now I’ll have to wait for the next season. Series are a great way to pass time.

roman_nepali: Malai ta gardening dherai man parxa, especially flowers haru lagauna. Aajai maile mero garden ma new roses lagako xu, aba ali care garna parla. Gardening le ta mind lai calm garxa.
english: I really love gardening, especially planting flowers. Today I planted new roses in my garden; now I’ll have to take care of them. Gardening really calms the mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old friend lai bhetna gayeko thiye, dherai din dekhi bheteko thiyeina. Hamile dherai kura haru share gareu, ani tyo old memories haru refresh bhayo. Friendship ta ekdamai valuable xa.
english: Today I went to meet my old friend; we hadn’t met in a long time. We shared so many things, and those old memories came back. Friendship is so valuable.

roman_nepali: Malai ta stargazing dherai man parxa, especially tyo clear night ma. Aajai maile rooftop ma basera stars herthe, ekdamai peaceful thyo. Universe ko beauty nai arko level ko xa.
english: I really love stargazing, especially on clear nights. Today I sat on the rooftop and watched the stars; it was so peaceful. The beauty of the universe is on another level.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero office ko new project suru gareko xu, dherai challenging xa. Tara malai ta ali pressure ma kaam garna man parxa, it keeps me motivated. Team pani ramro xa, sabai le milera kaam garxan.
english: Today I started a new project at my office, and it’s quite challenging. But I like working under a bit of pressure; it keeps me motivated. The team is also great; everyone works together.

roman_nepali: Malai ta traveling dherai man parxa, especially tyo road trips haru. Aajai maile mero friends sanga Chitwan gako thiye, dherai maja ayo. New places haru explore garna ta ekdamai exciting hunxa.
english: I really love traveling, especially road trips. Today I went to Chitwan with my friends, and it was so much fun. Exploring new places is really exciting.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero favorite band ko concert ma gayeko thiye, dherai ramro experience thyo. Music le ta soul lai touch garxa, ani malai pani ali refresh bhayo. Concerts ta life ko best part haru hun.
english: Today I went to a concert of my favorite band, and it was an amazing experience. Music really touches the soul, and I felt so refreshed. Concerts are one of the best parts of life.

roman_nepali: Malai ta writing dherai man parxa, especially tyo short stories haru. Aajai maile new story suru gareko xu, aba ali time lagla sakuna lai. Writing le ta imagination lai express garna help garxa.
english: I really love writing, especially short stories. Today I started a new story; it’ll take some time to finish. Writing helps express imagination.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old school ma gayeko thiye, dherai memories refresh bhayo. Classroom, playground, sabai le ekdamai emotional banayo. Ahh, school ko din haru kati ramro thiyo.
english: Today I went to my old school, and so many memories came back. The classroom, the playground—everything made me emotional. Ahh, school days were so good.

roman_nepali: Malai ta photography dherai man parxa, especially tyo wildlife photography. Aajai maile Chitwan National Park ma ekdamai ramro photos khicheko thiye. Nature ko beauty nai arko level ko xa.
english: I really love photography, especially wildlife photography. Today I took some amazing photos at Chitwan National Park. The beauty of nature is on another level.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero favorite restaurant ma gayera momo khako xu, dherai mitho thyo. Malai ta jhole momo dherai man parxa, spicy ra juicy vayeko. Ahh, I can’t get enough of it.
english: Today I went to my favorite restaurant and ate momo; it was so delicious. I really love jhol momo, the spicy and juicy ones. Ahh, I can’t get enough of it.

roman_nepali: Malai ta yoga dherai man parxa, especially tyo morning session haru. Aajai maile yoga gareko thiye, dherai refreshing feel bhayo. Yoga le ta mind ra body donai lai calm garxa.
english: I really love yoga, especially morning sessions. Today I did yoga, and it felt so refreshing. Yoga calms both the mind and the body.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero old guitar repair gareko xu, dherai din dekhi bigreko thiyo. Aba ta feri bajaudai xu, music le ta life lai colorful banauxa. Ahh, I missed playing it.
english: Today I got my old guitar repaired; it had been broken for a long time. Now I’m playing it again; music makes life colorful. Ahh, I missed playing it.

roman_nepali: Malai ta reading novels dherai man parxa, especially tyo mystery genre. Aajai maile new novel kineko xu, aba weekend ma padhna suru gareko xu. Books le ta mind lai expand nai garxa.
english: I really love reading novels, especially the mystery genre. Today I bought a new novel, and I’ve started reading it over the weekend. Books really expand the mind.

roman_nepali: Aajai maile mero ghar ko balcony ma new plants lagako xu, dherai ramro dekhinxa. Gardening le ta mind lai fresh nai garidinxa, ani malai pani ali time pass hunxa.
english: Today I planted new plants on my home balcony; they look so beautiful. Gardening really freshens up the mind, and it’s also a good way to pass time.

roman_nepali: Malai ta cycling dherai man parxa, especially tyo early morning ma. Aajai maile 10 km cycle gareko thiye, dherai refreshing feel bhayo. Exercise le ta body lai active rakhxa.
english: I really love cycling, especially in the early morning. Today I cycled 10 km, and it felt so refreshing. Exercise keeps the body active.

roman_nepali: Malai ta hiking dherai man parxa, especially tyo hills haru ma. Aajai maile Nagarkot hike gareko thiye, dherai ramro view thyo. Nature le ta mind lai refresh nai garidinxa.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jati jat, jat, ra bhasha chan. Yaha ko sanskriti ekdamai rich cha ra dherai chha. Himalaya ko godh ma basiraheko yaha ko manche haru dherai mehanati ra atithi sewak hun.
english: Nepal is home to many ethnicities, castes, and languages. The culture here is very rich and diverse. The people living in the lap of the Himalayas are very hardworking and hospitable.

roman_nepali: Paila ko samaya ma, Nepal ma sadak ra bijuli ko samasya thiyo. Tara aaja, dherai thau ma ramro sadak ra bijuli ko suvidha upalabdh cha. Yo desh ko bikash ma ek naya chapter ho.
english: In the past, Nepal faced issues with roads and electricity. But today, many places have good roads and reliable electricity. This is a new chapter in the country's development.

roman_nepali: Himalaya ko sundarata le Nepal lai duniya bhar ma prasiddha banayo. Sagarmatha, jasalai Everest pani bhanincha, duniya ko sabai bhanda uchai chuchuro ho. Yo Nepal ko gaurav ho.
english: The beauty of the Himalayas has made Nepal famous worldwide. Sagarmatha, also known as Everest, is the highest peak in the world. This is the pride of Nepal.

roman_nepali: Nepali haru ko bich ma chha dashain ra tihar jasto mahatvapurna chha. Dashain ma ghar ma bhetghat huncha ra tihar ma diyo balincha. Yo chha Nepal ko sabai bhanda thulo chha.
english: Among Nepali people, festivals like Dashain and Tihar are very important. During Dashain, family reunions take place, and during Tihar, oil lamps are lit. These are the biggest festivals in Nepal.

roman_nepali: Aaja ko digital yug ma, Nepal le pani technology ko kshetra ma dherai pugisakyo. Dherai jana le internet ra social media ko upyog gari raheka chhan. Yo desh ko lagi ek ramro avasar ho.
english: In today's digital age, Nepal has also made significant progress in the field of technology. Many people are using the internet and social media. This is a great opportunity for the country.

roman_nepali: Nepal ko prakritik sundarata le dherai videshi manche haru lai akarsit garcha. Chitwan National Park ma ek chhin rhino ra tiger herna paunchha. Yo Nepal ko ek mahatvapurna dhan ho.
english: Nepal's natural beauty attracts many foreigners. In Chitwan National Park, one can see rhinos and tigers. This is one of Nepal's most valuable treasures.

roman_nepali: Kathmandu ko durghatna pachi, dherai manche haru le earthquake ko barema jankari prapt gare. Yo ek bhayabahak ghatana thiyo, tara Nepal le dherai kura sikyo ra punah nirman ko karya suru garyo.
english: After the Kathmandu disaster, many people became aware of earthquakes. It was a terrifying event, but Nepal learned many lessons and began reconstruction efforts.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jana le kheti garera aphno jindagi bitauchhan. Kheti ko lagi pani ko mahatvapurna bhumika huncha. Tara climate change le yo kshetra lai asar gari raheko chha.
english: In Nepal, many people spend their lives farming. Water plays a crucial role in agriculture. However, climate change is affecting this sector.

roman_nepali: Nepal ko shiksha pranali ma dherai sudhar garnu parchha. Dherai vidhyarthi haru le ramro shiksha prapt garna sakdainan. Yo desh ko bhavishya ko lagi ek thulo samasya ho.
english: Nepal's education system needs many improvements. Many students are unable to receive a quality education. This is a major challenge for the country's future.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jana le swasthya sewako abhab bata pareschan. Gaun gaun ma swasthya chauki haru ko sthapana garnu ek mahatvapurna kadam ho. Yo desh ko swasthya pranali lai sudharna parchha.
english: In Nepal, many people suffer from a lack of healthcare services. Establishing health posts in every village is an important step. The country's healthcare system needs improvement.

roman_nepali: Nepali samaj ma parivar ko mahatvapurna bhumika hunchha. Sabai ko lagi ek arka ko sahara hune bhaneko chha hamro sanskar.
english: In Nepali society, family plays a crucial role. It is our culture to support one another.

roman_nepali: Gaun ma sabai manche ek arka lai chinchan ra ek arka ko samasya ma sahayog garchhan. Yo hamro samudayi ko shakti ho.
english: In the village, everyone knows each other and helps with each other's problems. This is the strength of our community.

roman_nepali: Aajkal ka yuba haru le social media ko upyog gari samajik samasya haru barema jankari failauchhan. Yo ek ramro prayas ho.
english: These days, youth are using social media to spread awareness about social issues. This is a good initiative.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jana le jati bhedbhav ko samna garchhan. Yo samajik samasya lai dur garna hamile sabai le milera kaam garnu parchha.
english: Many people in Nepal face caste discrimination. We all need to work together to eliminate this social issue.

roman_nepali: Samaj ma mahila haru le dherai samasya haru ko samna garchhan. Uniharuko sahakarya ra adhikar ko lagi ladnu parchha.
english: Women in society face many challenges. We must fight for their participation and rights.

roman_nepali: Nepali samaj ma bihe ek mahatvapurna sanskritik chha. Tara aajkal ka yuba haru le afno pasand ko sathi sanga bihe garna khojiraheka chhan.
english: Marriage is an important cultural practice in Nepali society. But nowadays, young people are seeking to marry partners of their choice.

roman_nepali: Samaj ma budha manche haru lai samman garnu parchha. Uniharule dherai anubhav ra gyan sanga hamro samaj lai agadi badhauchhan.
english: Elderly people in society should be respected. They contribute their experience and knowledge to move our society forward.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jana le garibi ko samna garchhan. Yo samajik samasya lai dur garna sarkar ra samudayi le milera kaam garnu parchha.
english: Many people in Nepal face poverty. The government and community must work together to address this social issue.

roman_nepali: Samaj ma shikshako mahatvapurna bhumika hunchha. Uniharule yuba haru lai ramro shiksha ra sanskar diyera samaj lai sudharna madat garchhan.
english: Teachers play a crucial role in society. They help improve society by providing good education and values to the youth.

roman_nepali: Nepali samaj ma dherai chha ra dherai bhasha chan. Sabai lai samman ra adhikar dinu hamro kartavya ho.
english: Nepali society is diverse, with many castes and languages. It is our duty to respect and provide rights to everyone.

roman_nepali: Samaj ma yuba haru ko bhumika ekdamai mahatvapurna chha. Uniharule naya vichar ra parivartan lyauna sakchhan.
english: The role of youth in society is very important. They can bring new ideas and change.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jana le swasthya sewako abhab bata pareschan. Samudayi le milera yo samasya lai dur garna sakchha.
english: Many people in Nepal suffer from a lack of healthcare services. The community can work together to solve this issue.

roman_nepali: Samaj ma balbalika haru lai surakshit ra sammanjanak banauna hamile sabai le milera kaam garnu parchha.
english: We must all work together to make society safe and respectful for children.

roman_nepali: Nepali samaj ma dherai jana le afno samasya haru lai chupchaap sahanchan. Yo chha ek thulo samasya.
english: In Nepali society, many people silently endure their problems. This is a major issue.

roman_nepali: Samaj ma mahila ra purush lai barabar ko adhikar dinu parchha. Yo chha hamro samaj ko sudhar ko lagi ek mahatvapurna kadam.
english: Women and men must be given equal rights in society. This is an important step for the improvement of our society.

roman_nepali: Nepal ma dherai jana le afno samudayi ko lagi kaam garchhan. Yo chha hamro samaj ko ek ramro paksha.
english: Many people in Nepal work for their community. This is a good aspect of our society.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero din ekdamai busy thiyo. Office bata aayera ghar ma khana pakayera khayeko. Aba chai ali relax garchu.
english: Today was a very busy day for me. I came home from the office and cooked food. Now I’ll relax a bit.

roman_nepali: Tyo naya cafe ma momo khada ekdamai mitho thiyo. Pheri jane plan banaudai chu.
english: The momo at that new cafe was really delicious. I’m planning to go again.

roman_nepali: Malai hiking garna man lagcha. Pahad herna ra fresh hawa ma basna ekdamai ramro lagcha.
english: I feel like going hiking. Seeing the mountains and being in the fresh air feels really good.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero sathi sanga kura garda gardai rati vayo. Kati ramro lagcha yaar afno manche sanga kura garne.
english: Today, while talking with my friend, it got late. It feels so good to talk with someone close to you.

roman_nepali: Malai naya guitar sikne ichcha cha. YouTube bata sikna thaleko chu.
english: I want to learn to play the guitar. I’ve started learning from YouTube.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero mobile ma naya game download gareko chu. Khelna ekdamai majja lagcha.
english: Today I downloaded a new game on my phone. It’s really fun to play.

roman_nepali: Mero ghar ma aaja dhosti haru aune chan. Uniharuko lagi pizza order gareko chu.
english: My friends are coming over to my house today. I’ve ordered pizza for them.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero gadi ko service bhaeko thiyo. Aba chalauda ekdamai smooth chalcha.
english: Today my car got serviced. Now it drives very smoothly.

roman_nepali: Malai naya book kinne ichcha cha. Kunai ramro recommendation cha?
english: I feel like buying a new book. Do you have any good recommendations?

roman_nepali: Aaja mero didi le mithai banayeko thiyo. Kati mitho thiyo yaar!
english: Today my sister made sweets. They were so delicious!

roman_nepali: Malai aaja gym jana man lagena. Tara afno health ko lagi jana parcha.
english: I didn’t feel like going to the gym today. But I have to go for my health.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero office ma ekdamai dherai kaam thiyo. Ghar aayera sutna man lagcha.
english: There was a lot of work at my office today. I feel like sleeping after coming home.

roman_nepali: Malai naya movie herne ichcha cha. Kunai ramro movie cha herna lai?
english: I feel like watching a new movie. Is there any good movie to watch?

roman_nepali: Aaja mero sathi sanga coffee shop ma basera kura gareko thiye. Kati ramro lagcha yaar tyasto bela.
english: Today I sat at a coffee shop and talked with my friend. It feels so good to spend time like that.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja khana pakauda ekdamai majja aayo. Naya recipe try gareko thiye.
english: I really enjoyed cooking today. I tried a new recipe.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero ghar ma internet slow cha. Kaam garna ekdamai garho bhaeko cha.
english: The internet at my home is slow today. It’s very difficult to work.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja bike chalau jane ichcha cha. Road trip jasto lagcha.
english: I feel like going for a bike ride today. It feels like a road trip.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero mobile ko screen futyo. Aba naya kinna parcha.
english: Today my phone screen broke. Now I have to buy a new one.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja khana ma chatpate khane ichcha cha. Tyo ekdamai spicy ra tasty huncha.
english: I feel like eating chatpate today. It’s very spicy and tasty.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero ghar ma sabai sanga milera khana khayeko thiye. Kati ramro lagcha yaar family sanga basna.
english: Today I ate food with everyone at home. It feels so good to be with family.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja football khelne ichcha cha. Sathi haru sanga ground ma jane plan banauchu.
english: I feel like playing football today. I’ll plan to go to the ground with my friends.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero laptop ko battery ekdamai chito sakincha. Naya kinna parne bhaeko cha.
english: Today my laptop battery drains very quickly. I need to buy a new one.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja shopping garna man lagcha. Naya luga kinna ichcha cha.
english: I feel like going shopping today. I want to buy new clothes.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero ghar ma dhosti haru aune chan. Uniharuko lagi khana pakaudai chu.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja rati herne movie ko lagi popcorn kinne ichcha cha.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero gadi ma petrol sakiyo. Petrol pump ma jana parne bhaeko cha.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja khana ma pizza khane ichcha cha. Tyo ekdamai tasty huncha.
english: I feel like eating pizza today. It’s very tasty.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero ghar ma sabai sanga milera khana khayeko thiye. Kati ramro lagcha yaar family sanga basna.
english: Today I ate food with everyone at home. It feels so good to be with family.

roman_nepali: Malai aaja football khelne ichcha cha. Sathi haru sanga ground ma jane plan banauchu.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero sathi sanga Pokhara gako thiye. Fewa Tal ma boat chalayo ra pahad heryo. Kati ramro thiyo!
english: Today I went to Pokhara with my friend. We rowed a boat in Fewa Lake and saw the mountains. It was so beautiful!

roman_nepali: Dashain ma ghar ma dherai mitho khana bancha. Momo, sel roti, ra masu khana ekdamai majja aayo.
english: During Dashain, a lot of delicious food is made at home. Eating momo, sel roti, and meat is so much fun.

roman_nepali: Malai naya phone kinne ichcha cha. Aba iPhone 15 ko barema sochiraheko chu.
english: I feel like buying a new phone. I’m thinking about the iPhone 15.

roman_nepali: Aaja mero ghar ma internet nai chalena. Kaam garna ekdamai garho bhaeko cha.
english: Today the internet isn’t working at my house. It’s very difficult to work.

roman_nepali: Malai trekking garna man lagcha. Annapurna Base Camp jane sochiraheko chu.
